benchmark_details.name: PhotoBench
benchmark_details.overview: PhotoBench is a professional benchmark for aesthetic visual understanding that offers 284 photography sub-topics and insights from photography professionals.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive evaluation of aesthetic visual understanding for multimodal large language models (MLLMs).

data.source: Derived from extensive discussions among photography professionals and enthusiasts through online platforms.
data.annotation: Generated from discussions of professional photographers and enthusiasts.

methodology.calculation: Evaluated the performance based on the quality and relevance of generated questions.
methodology.interpretation: A higher score indicates better performance on aesthetic visual understanding.
methodology.baseline_results: Compared against existing benchmarks like Q-Bench and AesBench.
methodology.validation: Extensive tests against existing models showed clear advantages.
